metadata.description: A curated collection of Claude AI plugins for financial analysis, product management, and AI optimization

plugins.name: financial-advisor
plugins.description: Financial analysis and planning for software projects

plugins.name: product-manager
plugins.description: Product strategy, competitive analysis, persona definition, and product evolution planning

plugins.name: ai-specialist
plugins.description: Proactive AI optimization agent that monitors Claude sessions, optimizes instructions, improves memory efficiency, designs test strategies, and reduces token usage
